question: How the body temperature is maintained?
option1: Due to temperature regulating mechanism located in the base of the brain
option2: Due to excessive intake of water
option3: Due to regular intake of foods
option4: Due to the constant flow of blood in the capillaries
answer: Due to temperature regulating mechanism located in the base of the brain
explanation: The hypothalamus part of the brain works with other parts of the body\'s temperature-regulating system, such as the skin, sweat glands and blood vessels. Water evaporating from the skin cools the body, keeping its temperature in a healthy range.
